Greetings to Sierra Leonean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Sierra Leonean President
    Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Sierra Leonean President  Al Haji Ahmad Tejan Kabbah on Apr. 24 on the occasion of the 44th anniversary of the independence of the country.
 The message expressed conviction that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would as ever grow stronger and sincerely wished the president and the people of Sierra Leone great success in their work for peace, stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Felicitates South Africa's National Day
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Felicitates South Africa's National Day
    Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Sunday sent a message of greetings to Thabo Mbuyelwa Mbeki, president of South Africa, on the occasion of its national day.
 The message reiterated the DPRK's stand to improve the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries in the mutual interests and sincerely wished the president success in his responsible work for national unity and prosperity of the country.

Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Chinese Delegation
    Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with the Dandong City, Liaoning Province, friendship delegation of China led by Mayor of the People's Government of Dandong City Chen Tiexin at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
 Vice-minister of Foreign Affairs Kim Hyong Jun and Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Wu Donghe were present.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Il
    Pyongyang, April 26 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was gifted by the visiting Dandong City, Liaoning Province, friendship delegation of China.
 Chen Tiexin, mayor of the People's Government of Dandong City, who is heading the delegation, handed over the gift to Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday.    
 Chen's own gift for Kim Jong Il was also conveyed.
